answers.answer: Hi the mri scan would most definite rule out ms, i have the same symptoms as yourself and was diagnosed with chronic fatigue syndrome back in 2010.Now and then i freak out,thinking i have something more sinister.Another thing could be fibromylgia.This causes fatigue and pain.I started feeling dizzy and having balance issues a few weeks back along with more severe fatigue,was told by doctor it can be caused by a number of things i have too which are, low bp and high heart rate.I would suggest having bloods done to check for thyroid etc as this causes similar symptoms.I have just had my thyroid and diabetes test done and am awaiting results.best of luck xx
